text: Paul Goerg is a Champagne producer based in the Vertus region of Champagne. The co-operative, founded in 1950, produces both vintage and non-vintage cuvee as well as a blanc de blancs Chardonnay Champagne. T. Stevenson, ed. The Sotheby's Wine Encyclopedia (4th Edition) pg 180 Dorling Kindersley 2005 ==See also== * List of Champagne houses ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Champagne producers
title: Paul Goerg
